import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import person from '../../assets/icons/personWhite.svg'; import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom/cjs/react-router-dom'; import searchIcon from '../../assets/icons/mdi_search.svg'; import { SingleAgentTransactionData } from "../../features/dashboard/data/transactionData"; import { useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; const ViewSingleAgent = () => { const transactions = SingleAgentTransactionData(); const [startDate, setStartDate] = useState(''); const [endDate, setEndDate] = useState(''); const location = useLocation(); const queryParams = new URLSearchParams(location.search); const agentCode = queryParams.get('agentCode') || 'Default Agent Code'; const name = queryParams.get('name') || 'Default Name'; const phoneNumber = queryParams.get('phoneNumber') || 'Default Phone Number'; return ( <>

{name}

{agentCode}

{phoneNumber}

Create Agent

Agent Transaction

Sort by

Start Date

setStartDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="Select Start Date" />

End Date

{/* Date input for end date */}
setEndDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="Select End Date" />

Start Date

setStartDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="Select Start Date" />

End Date

{/* Date input for end date */}
setEndDate(e.target.value)} placeholder="Select End Date" />
{transactions.length === 0 ? (

No transactions found for the agent.

) : ( <>

Transaction ref

Transaction ID

Transaction type

Status

Date created

{transactions.map((transaction, index) => (
{transaction.TransactionRef}
{transaction.TransactionID}
{transaction.TransactionType}
{transaction.Status}
{transaction.date}
))} )}
); }; export default ViewSingleAgent;
